title: SpaceX to break 2021 record with 32nd launch of 2022
summary: SpaceX is set to break several records on the Starlink Group 3-2 mission. Launching from Space Launch Complex 4 East (SLC-4E) at the Vandenberg Space Force Base in California, the Falcon 9 Block 5 will place 46 Starlink internet communication satellites into the third shell of the constellation.

title: China could shift to fully reusable super heavy-launcher in wake of Starship
summary: China’s launch vehicle makers appear to be designing a fully reusable version of the Long March 9 super heavy-lift rocket needed for future megaprojects.

title: SpaceX adds fourth tower segment to Florida Starship launch pad
summary: The fourth of nine sections for SpaceX’s Starship launch pad gantry was moved to Launch Complex 39A Wednesday night for stacking, following the emplacement of the tower’s first three segments last month.

title: Isar Aerospace to launch from French Guiana
summary: European small launch vehicle developer Isar Aerospace has signed an agreement with the French space agency CNES to launch its Spectrum rocket from French Guiana.

title: UK’s ‘Astra Carta’ movement sees space sustainability as chance to lead
summary: The U.K. sees satellite servicing, debris removal and orbital sustainability as an opportunity to emerge as a major global space power.
